곱창쌀국수 1단계와 숯불 먹었습니다.곱창은 제입에 맞았고 숯불은 남자친구 입맛에 잘 맞아 둘다 맛있게 먹었어요. 1단계는 약간 뒷맛이 매콤한 정도구요. 곱창도 넉넉히 들어있습니다. 국물도 시원해서 가끔 생각날 것 같아요남자친구는 물에 빠진 고기는 별로 안좋아해서 곱창도 직화로 토치에 한번 구워주면 더 맛있을것 같다고 하더라구요.저희는 일요일 11시 10분쯤 도착해서 바로 들어갔는데 11시30분쯤 되니 사람이 몰려서 웨이팅 있었습니다.

Super cool experience and good food! I ordered the fire charcoal grilled pho where they blast the pho meat and veggies with a torch in front of you before they hand it to you. The quantity of the food is a lot which makes the price so worth the bowl. Since they torch it

you can really taste a hint of smokiness when you eat the pho. it was really interesting and pretty delicious! the place is pretty busy so you may need to go inside and get a number from the cash register and wait in line for them to call you when a table is available. Once seated

you order from the table iPad and soon your food comes out. It was very fast! I ordered and like literally 30 seconds later they were out torching our pho for us. I was stuffed and pretty satisfied with our meal. They add a ton of bean sprouts and noodles and meat that the bowl was so deceptive. It didn't look that big but once you dig in
it's a lot of food. Next time I want to try the spicy red broth one I see so many other people ordering too.
